i1.name: Mana_Barrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, when '''Blitzcrank''' is damaged to {{as|{{sti|health|30% '''maximum''' health}}}}, a {{tip|shield}} is first generated that is equal to {{sti|mana|{{as|30% of '''maximum''' mana|mana}}}}, lasting up to 10 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank is damaged to 30% maximum health, a shield is first generated that is equal to 30% of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.
i1.notes:
* The shield will absorb the portion of incoming damage that would reduce health past 30%.
* ''Mana Barrier's'' interactions with other {{tip|shield}} effects that trigger before taking damage that would reduce below 30% health:
** ''Mana Barrier'' will trigger simultaneously with the {{nie|Lifeline}} effect from {{ii|Hexdrinker}}, {{ii|Maw of Malmortius}}, or {{ii|Immortal Shieldbow}} if '''Blitzcrank''' takes damage while above 30% health, and trigger before them when he takes damage while below 30% health.
*** ''Mana Barrier'' will always trigger simultaneously with the {{nie|Lifeline}} effect from {{ii|Sterak's Gage}} if '''Blitzcrank''' takes damage while above or below 30% health.
** ''Mana Barrier'' will trigger after {{ri|Nullifying Orb}} if '''Blitzcrank''' takes damage while above 30% health, and trigger simultaneously with it while below 30% health.

q1.name: Rocket_Grab
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' fires the right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.65 seconds}}, and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them towards '''Blitzcrank''', during which they are {{tip|standard sight|revealed}}.
'''''Blitzcrank''' is {{tip|lockout|unable}} to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Blitzcrank fires the right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage, stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are revealed.
Blitzcrank is unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.
q1.notes:
* ''Rocket Grab's'' range is composed of a missile with 1080 range, and a smaller center-range area check at the end (colloqially known as a 'lollipop').
** The area check is currently half as long as it is supposed to be, reducing the intended 1150 range of the ability to 1115 range. 
*** Hitting an enemy with this area check only also fails to play the ability's hit SFX. This makes it possible to easily distinguish whether the target was picked up by the missile collision or 'lollipop'.
** Targets [[size|larger than 95 units in radius]] can be hit by a different edge-range circle check at the end of the missile.
* The {{tip|airborne}} debuff lasts for up-to 1 second but will end prematurely when the target's movement stops, while the stun will persist (if duration permits).
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
* The target's destination lies 75 units in front of '''Blitzcrank'''. 
** If the target is closer than this, the effect will still move them to this location.
** If this location would be inside static terrain, the target's destination will end up on '''Blitzcrank's''' side, even if that means pulling them right on top of him.
*** This can occasionally fail.
* If '''Blitzcrank''' is being moved (e.g. {{tip|Airborne}}, {{tip|Kinematics}} or {{ai|Fate's Call|Kalista}}) during the grab, the target will be pulled towards '''Blitzcrank'''s old location.
* '''Blitzcrank''' will be ordered to [[basic attack]] the target once the target arrives.
* If the target dies to ''Rocket Grab's'' damage, they will not be pulled.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

w1.name: Overdrive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' shifts into overdrive, gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays to 10% over the first {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
When ''Overdrive'' ends, '''Blitzcrank''' is {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.5 seconds.
When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.
w1.notes: * The self-slow is affected by {{tip|slow resist}} and {{tip|Tenacity}}.

effects.str:
• Attack Speed:
  • Movement Speed:

e1.name: Power_Fist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank's''' next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, deals {{as|100% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target for 1 second.
''Power Fist'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Blitzcrank's''' basic attack timer.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Blitzcrank's next basic attack within 5 seconds has an uncancellable windup, deals 100% AD bonus physical damage and knocks up the target for 1 second.
Power Fist resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.
e1.notes:
* The {{tip|airborne|knockup}} is applied even if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}} or {{tip|blind|missed}}.
** It is not applied if it is {{tip|block|blocked}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents the {{tip|airborne|knockup}} but not the damage.
* The enhanced attack will still complete and hit the target even if they become {{tip|untargetable}} during the {{tip|attack windup|attack's windup}}.
* The target is displaced a short distance during the {{tip|airborne|knockup}} in a random direction.

r1.name: Static_Field
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While ''Static Field'' is not on cooldown, '''Blitzcrank's''' basic attacks [[on-hit]] apply a [[stack]], stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Blitzcrank''' detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating {{tip|shield|shields}} of nearby enemies before dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|silence|silencing}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack, stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal magic damage.
Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and silencing them for 0.5 seconds.

effects.str: • Bolt Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
• Detonation Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
